backend/main.mo: Canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles plus deposit intent and submission storage with related CRUD methods.
feature_evidence.json: JSON metadata listing feature reports, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference map of frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries for build and planning use.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layouts, guards, and global theme/toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that captures unhandled errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/layouts/AdminDas: Admin dashboard layout with sidebar, header, and routed main content area.
frontend/src/components/layouts/PublicLa: Public site layout with header, footer, routed content, and an Internet Identity init‑error banner.
frontend/src/components/layouts/UserDash: User dashboard layout containing sidebar navigation, header, and main outlet.
frontend/src/components/nav/AdminSidebar: Admin sidebar navigation with links to dashboard, deposits, users, announcements, and settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/DashboardHea: Header with sidebar trigger and logout button that clears identity, cache, and navigates to login.
frontend/src/components/nav/PublicFooter: Public footer showing copyright, branding, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/nav/PublicHeader: Public site header with logo, navigation links, and a responsive mobile menu.
Sidebar navigation for authenticated users with links to dashboard, tokens, and referral sections.
frontend/src/components/screens/AccessDe: Full-page screen informing the user of access denial with buttons to log in or return home.
frontend/src/components/screens/AppError: Fallback error screen prompting users to reload the page after an unexpected error.
frontend/src/components/screens/InitErro: Screen shown when initialization fails, offering a page reload option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks wrapping actor calls for profiles, presale data, deposits, and user lists with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: Hook combining identity, actor, and profile/role queries to expose session state and auth helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for theming, including dark mode and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHome.tsx: Shows the admin dashboard with user metrics placeholders and presale stage info.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettings.t: Provides admin settings layout with placeholder sections for presale, wallet, and vesting configuration.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Announcements.t: Renders an admin announcements page with a placeholder list indicating no announcements exist yet.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DepositsQueue.t: Displays the deposits queue page showing pending deposits, currently with a placeholder message.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UsersManagement: Fetches and displays a table of all registered users or a loading/empty state.
frontend/src/pages/auth/Login.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and redirects users based on session state, with UI for login errors.
frontend/src/pages/auth/Register.tsx: Manages user registration flow, including identity login, profile creation, validation, and saving.
frontend/src/pages/NotFound.tsx: Displays a styled 404 page with a button linking back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/public/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero, features, and presale promotion components for VCoin.
frontend/src/pages/public/Roadmap.tsx: Displays VCoin’s roadmap from 2025–2030 using card-based milestone sections.
frontend/src/pages/public/SmartContractA: Explains planned smart contract components and current off‑chain presale architecture.
frontend/src/pages/public/Whitepaper.tsx: Renders a structured whitepaper covering VCoin’s intro, tokenomics, vision, and reward model.
frontend/src/pages/user/BuyVCoin.tsx: User interface for calculating VCN purchases, viewing presale stage data, and creating deposit intents.
frontend/src/pages/user/DepositHistory.t: Shows a user’s parsed deposit submissions with status indicators and transaction details.
frontend/src/pages/user/ReferralEarnings: Displays the user's referral code, allows copying code/link, and shows referral reward tiers and total earnings.
frontend/src/pages/user/ReferralNetworkT: Shows an empty-state view for the user's multi-level referral network with explanatory alert.
frontend/src/pages/user/TokenBalance.tsx: Displays locked, unlocked, and total VCN balances with a warning about token lock until 2027.
frontend/src/pages/user/UserHome.tsx: User dashboard showing quick links to buy tokens, view balance, manage referrals, and copy referral code.
Shows vesting info and pre/post-launch messaging, with a placeholder schedule until the 2027 launch.
frontend/src/routes/routeGuards.tsx: Provides User and Admin route guards handling auth checks, redirects, errors, and admin password-change enforcement.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Generates environment-safe asset URLs using dev root or Vite’s BASE_URL for production.
frontend/src/utils/fingerprint.ts: Creates and stores a simple client fingerprint using browser attributes and base64 encoding.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters via query, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, containers, and enabling typography, container queries, and animations plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s versioned state, architectural notes, known issues with deployment, and a list of implemented features. Marks the current update as a fix request for a previously failing build.
